query:
SELECT
                id,
                name,
                description,
                owner = $1 AS is_owner,
                (
                    SELECT COUNT(*)
                    FROM project_group_member
                    WHERE group_id = $2
                ) AS members,
                (
                    SELECT COUNT(*)
                    FROM project
                    WHERE project_group_id = $2
                ) AS projects
            FROM project_group pg
            WHERE pg.id = $2
